name: Amped Finance
description: Amped is a decentralized entirely on chain trading protocol combining spot and perpetual markets with yield-optimizing vaults and agentic AI integrations. Built for composability, it enables users to trade, earn, and automate onchain while directing value back to participants through a transparent, rewards-driven model. While launching on Sonic network the protocol is omnichain, and aims to provide a defragmented cross-chain agentic-enabled DeFAI experience.
